title: Park Hyatt Chennai
sub_title: Lovely room with a resort feel in city
description_short: Park Hyatt Chennai also offers many facilities to enrich your stay in Chennai. While lodging at this wonderful property, guests can enjoy 24-hour room service, free Wi-Fi in all rooms, 24-hour security, daily housekeeping, postal service.
the_space: In addition, all guestrooms feature a variety of comforts.
guest_access: Park Hyatt Chennai is a smart choice for travelers to Chennai, offering a relaxed and hassle-free stay every time.
guest_access_points: Many rooms even provide television LCD/plasma screen, bathroom phone, clothes rack, complimentary tea, dressing room to please the most discerning guest.
The hotel's hot tub, fitness center, sauna, golf course (within 3 km), outdoor pool are ideal places to relax and unwind after a busy day.

reviews.name: Kamolmas
reviews.review: My stay at the hotel was just superb. All the facilities are of exceptional standards, as one would expect from a Hyatt hotel. However, above and beyond my expectations was the hospitality of the staff who had the 'can-do' attitudes and made me feel welcome to ask for assistance.I never actually felt quite sad having to leave a hotel like when I had to leave Park Hyatt Chennai, and I've traveled extensively. It's the people who made this hotel truly exceptional.

reviews.name: Nitin
reviews.review: Super clean. The balcony is the best.

reviews.name: Alena
reviews.review: I will always choose this hotel when I get back to Chennai and will be recommending it to friends.I came to Chennai from Delhi, where I left my credit card at the airport. Can you imagine my state when I found it? The hotel staff calmed me and helped me to find this card. They have done everything possible so that I could feel their support and concern for me.

reviews.name: Prabhu
reviews.review: This was the best stay ever in Chennai for us. The Staff were very courteous and quite helpful. Everything was quite systematic with a personal touch. Whenever we would visit Chennai, will surely stay here.

reviews.name: Eere
reviews.review: One of the best i stay in Chennai. Very new and modern has reasonably big rooms. Hotel staff were great very friendly and welcoming even though I was only there for one night stay and would highly reccomend this hotel to others.

reviews.name: Gayathri
reviews.review: This is my 5th time staying at Park Hyatt, it feels like my second home. The staff are friendly and helpful. I would like to say a special thanks to Mr. Abhishek for booking a cab for me and the security guards who got me an auto whenever I needed one. Staff at the Antahpura spa are phenomenal. Thanks Park Hyatt!

reviews.name: Vandana
reviews.review: Had an extremely comfortable stay at the Park Hyatt. Everything from rooms to the service is superb! The food too was excellent, although we only ordered room service... Definitely a hotel we will visit again and again!

sitter_description: 8I can assure you to make your pet feel home and provide all his basic necessities . I strive towards providing a cage free and home feel environment to my furry guests. The basic needs and necessity like food, water, litter area, toys will be provided. when it's under my care, i can assure you your pets is in good hands
sap_services: CERTIFIED & PROFESSIONAL dog groomers in chennai, Specialized in grooming all dog breeds.
We offer grooming services that include basic clean-up services such as bathing, ear-cleaning, blow-drying, brush and de-shedding.
Paw Paradise also provides more indulgent facilities like hair styling, pawdicure and much more.
map_description_short: Ideal for fun and relaxation, Park Hyatt Chennai is located in the Chennai City Center area of Chennai. The hotel is not too far from the city center: just 4.5 Km away, and it normally takes about 20 minutes to reach the airport.
map_description_getting_around: With its convenient location, the hotel offers easy access to the city's must-see destinations.OLA/Uber and other cabs services available 24/7.Within a 2 Kms radius, there are multiple bus stops.If you need to park your 2 or 4 wheeler, we provide ample parking space in our basement.Bandappa Garden is a 5 minute walk from the guest house.
